channel.title: Browsers on Gamey
channel.description: Recent content in Browsers on Gamey

item.title: Browsers on the Pinephone
item.description: Today I thought I would do a full rewrite of my Pinephone browsers post because it’s obviously a important peace on every phone specially with a limited app selection. I hope this is helpful to some of you and as always all my testing is done on my 2GB Pinephone with DanctNIX Arch Linux.
